Articles.Content:
please excuse the terrible graphics here but has there been any consideration of adding a shipyard to KSP? I know it has nothing to do with Rocketry but it seems there are quite a few of us that like building water crafts

http://i.imgur.com/0ySfBvm.png' alt='0ySfBvm.png'>

Also, that would be very useful with BoatParts, USI ocean refinery, Interstellar ocean refinery, as otherwise you need to improvise.

I doubt very much that Squad will do that, as their way looks a pure flight-oriented, but probably Kerbin-Side mod ( http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785-0-25-Kerbin-Side-v0-39-1-It-s-Scott-Manley-s-Fault ) could be extended in such way.

Its definitions look simple. Probably, you can look any cfg file and add an instance of the structure to any place you like Ã¢â‚¬â€ say, near KSC Ã¢â‚¬â€ just set correct coordinates and adjust a rotation angle.

(Btw: to place it just to the East from runway and launchpad is not a good idea. Better move it to North or South.)

+1 for creative photoshop

I love this idea, i've built so many ships I need this

I normally just hyperedit them into the water and go from there.

YES! SHIPS!

I approve of this idea. :D

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I agree the placement could be in a better place

YES! SHIPS!

I approve of this idea. :D

http://imgur.com/a/o0lHZ

http://i.imgur.com/3yc268M.png

Thanks for the vote!
I love it, but only as a mod. There's really no purpose to having a shipyard in stock right now.
